title: tar Header documentation is inadequate
body:
The tar.Header has some fields that look similar to os.FileInfo fields, e.g.,
tar.Header.Mtime vs. os.FileInfo.Mtime_ns. I think it would be helpful to change the
tar.Header along these lines:

    Mtime int64 // Seconds since the epoch

Would also be nice if the other fields were commented with some idea of what to put in
them (e.g., Typeflag).
